title: Sometimes it starts,  sometimes it doesn't...
body: So LOL sometimes starts for me and other times it doesn't.  When it doesn't start I have to restart my computer and then it works.  What could be causing this?

replies.body: League won't start as in, it won't open whatsoever? There might be some leftover processes running from the last time you had League open if it somehow didn't close out correctly. If that happens again, try checking task manager before restarting to see if there are any League processes still running and close them out. Let me know if that works!
